name: Amcontrol
tagline: osx, mac, app, apache, mysql, server
body:
#AMControl

##Description

With this small Mac OS X (10.9) App you can start and stopp the Mac builtin Apache and MySql Servers.
It's like the tiny app XAMPP Control...

The app looks like 

![](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ew0bxg27lrw7yib/githubAMControl.png)
